definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
(bird species of China) common redstart (Phoenicurus phoenicurus)
(bird species of China) European robin (Erithacus rubecula)
(bird species of China) common buzzard (Buteo buteo)

sentences.english: I have the answer when I am in Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 当我身临欧亚时，我已经知道了。

sentences.english: Creation of the Eurasia World Scout Region, serving the 12 countries of the C. I. S .
sentences.chinese: 成立欧亚地区办事处，服务独立国协的12个国家。
类似柽柳的一种欧亚灌木。

sentences.english: Why do male robins have red breasts?
sentences.chinese: 为什么雄性欧亚鸲胸部呈红色？

sentences.english: Russia stretches across much of the north of the supercontinent of Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯横跨欧亚大陆北部的大部分地区。

sentences.english: Eurasian herb with white or pinkish flowers in a terminal corymb.
sentences.chinese: 欧亚草本植物，伞房花序末端开白色或淡紫色花。

sentences.english: Eurasian marten having a brown coat with pale breast and throat.
sentences.chinese: 欧亚大陆的貂，褐色皮毛，雄部和。

sentences.english: This species is very widely distributed in tropical and warm regions of the Old World.
sentences.chinese: 本种是在欧亚大陆的热带和温暖的地区里的广泛分布。

sentences.english: The Middle East is located in the junction of Europe, Asia and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 中东地处欧亚非三大洲交接处，战略地位十分重要。

sentences.english: The incident comes less than a year after a similar outage brought a halt to communications between Europe, Africa and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 此次事件距上次欧亚非通讯中断时隔不到一年。

sentences.english: Three powers are emerging on the periphery of Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 在欧亚大陆周缘地带将出现三大势力。

sentences.english: Eurasian primrose with yellow flowers clustered in a one - sided umbel .
sentences.chinese: 欧亚报春花，花黄色，丛生于单侧的伞形花序。

sentences.english: The land mass comprising the continents of Europe and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 常见于欧亚大陆北部的陆栖小毒蛇。

sentences.english: The more central Ural Mountains is a north-south range which divides Europe from Asia.
sentences.chinese: 更中心的乌拉尔山脉是区分欧亚大陆的西北面的山脉。

sentences.english: I have got the answer when I am in Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 当我身临欧亚时，我已经知道了。

definition: the Silk Road/abbr. for 絲綢之路|丝绸之路[Si1 chou2 zhi1 Lu4]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
